name: osg_tools
description: Classes and functions for working with OpenSceneGraph

scripts.config-ninja: del-cli build/* && make-dir build && cd build && cmake .. -DCMAKE_VERBOSE_MAKEFILE=ON -DOSG_TOOLS_BUILD_TESTS=ON -G Ninja
scripts.config-vcpp: del-cli build/* && make-dir build && cd build && cmake .. -DCMAKE_VERBOSE_MAKEFILE=ON -DOSG_TOOLS_BUILD_TESTS=ON -Ax64
scripts.config-xcode: del-cli build/* && make-dir build && cd build && cmake .. -DCMAKE_VERBOSE_MAKEFILE=ON -DOSG_TOOLS_BUILD_TESTS=ON -G Xcode
scripts.config-debug: del-cli build/* && make-dir build && cd build && cmake .. -DCMAKE_VERBOSE_MAKEFILE=ON -DOSG_TOOLS_BUILD_TESTS=ON -DOSG_TOOLS_ENABLE_CODE_COVERAGE=OFF -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Debug
scripts.config-release: del-cli build/* && make-dir build && cd build && cmake .. -DCMAKE_VERBOSE_MAKEFILE=ON -DOSG_TOOLS_BUILD_TESTS=ON -DOSG_TOOLS_ENABLE_CODE_COVERAGE=OFF -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Release
scripts.watch-debug: watch "npm run clear && npm run build && npm run test-debug"   ./ --filter=./watch_filter.js
scripts.watch-release: watch "npm run clear && npm run build && npm run test-release" ./ --filter=./watch_filter.js

author: Perry L Miller IV
